title: The ChatGPT Story
description: Follow the journey from the transformer architecture to ChatGPT and understand how AI chatbots came to be. Perfect for anyone who wants to understand the foundations of modern AI assistants.
targetAudience: Business professionals and curious learners new to AI
keyTakeaways: Understand what transformers are and why they revolutionized AI
Know the difference between GPT-1, GPT-2, GPT-3, and ChatGPT
Explain ChatGPT to colleagues without using technical jargon
